subject: R.e: Our meeting
body:
Hi there lovely,
I was searching the net few days ago. I am new to this thing.
and saw your profile. I decided to email you cause I found 
you aattractive. I might come down to your city in few weeks.
Let me know if we caabn maeet each other in person.
I am attractive gairl. I am sure you won't regret it.
Reply tbo my pearsonal emaail at vcuru@SpringMailSite.info
